messages.subject: Educational "TV Guide" Site
messages.msgSnippet: Hi again; This is a wonderful site! It is a web page that lists the scheduled programs and some study guides for some of the educational channels, such as
messages.messageBody:
Hi again;
This is a wonderful site! It is a web page that lists the scheduled programs
and some study guides for some of the educational channels, such as Discovery
and The Learning Channel.
Sheree


http://www.quailhaven.com/hsboard/tvwatch.htm

A&E = <A HREF="http://www.aetv.com/tv/">Arts & Entertainment</A>  (<A HREF="http://www.aetv.com/class/teach/index.html">complete list of lesson plans</A>) (<A HREF="http://www.aetv.com/class/classcal/root.cgi">Classroom series
calendar</A>) 
DSC = <A HREF="http://dsc.discovery.com/">Discovery Channel</A> (<A HREF="http://school.discovery.com/lessonplans/9-12.html">complete list of lesson plans</A>)
THC = <A HREF="http://www.historychannel.com/ontv/index.html">The History Channel</A> 
        (<A HREF="http://www.historychannel.com/classroom/index.html">Study Guides and Classroom Calendar</A> - CLICK ON "CLASSROOM" IN THE
TOP TOOLBAR, THEN SELECT
               EITHER STUDY GUIDES or CLASSROOM CALENDAR)
TLC = <A HREF="http://tlc.discovery.com/">The Learning Channel</A> 
TRV = <A HREF="http://travel.discovery.com/">The Travel Channel</A>




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
